products.name: 3D Pen
products.description: It's a pen that can draw in the air! 3Doodler is the 3D printing pen you can hold in your hand. Lift your imagination off the page!

products.name: Bear Bean Bag
products.description: A soft squishy bean bag that's in a shape of a bear. How cute!

products.name: Flavour Infused Water Bottle
products.description: Want to stay healthy? Put in your favourite fruits & let it's flavours be infused in your water!

products.name: Polaroid Hanger
products.description: Do you have a friend that loves taking or keeping polaroids? This polaroid hanger is gonna be the best gift he/she has ever received! Review your memories 365 days a year!

products.name: Cat Hoodie
products.description: Are you a cat lover? You're gonna love this Cat Hoodie!

products.name: Key Smart
products.description: Do you hate it when your keys jingle in your pocket? How about having those keys poking your legs through your jeans? Urghh! Key Smart is the one you're looking for! It's light, compact and simple to use!

products.name: Star Wars Waffle Maker
products.description: Are you a star wars fan? I bet you'll love having a star wars shaped waffles for breakfast!

products.name: Super Hero Bookend
products.description: To all marvel fans and book junkies, this is something you must have in your collection!
